text:
Michael Fassbender (born 2 April 1977) is a German and Irish actor. He is best known for appearing in the movies "Inglourious Basterds" (2009), ' (2011), "Prometheus" (2012), "12 Years a Slave" (2013), and ' (2014).
Fassbender was born in Heidelberg, Baden-Württemberg, West Germany (now Germany). His mother, Adele, is Irish and his father, Josef, is German. When he was two years old, his parents moved to Killarney, County Kerry, in the Republic of Ireland. He lives in London, England. He is fluent in both English and German.
Filmography.
God Of War Part I (2009)
God Of War Part II (2010)
God Of War II - Killer Of The Thieves (2012)
God Of War III - God Of The Seas (2014)
